modName: TTYM - Think To Yourself Messages Frostfall Module
summary: A fixed version of VorpalBlades' TTYM Frostfall module.
descriptionHtml:
Name: TTYM - Think To Yourself Messages Frostfall Module
Version: 1.1
Date: 2014/11/17
Category: Immersion
Author(s): VorpalBlades, Helseth and Raulfin

Description
===========
A fixed version of VorpalBlades' Think To Yourself Messages Frostfall module.
Fixed in TES5Edit.

TTYM - Changes by Raulfin
=======================
Updated Frostfall module based on version by Helseth
Corrected overwritten Frostfall spells to point to the correct Frostfall Magic Effects.
Corrected EDID errors
Carried over TTYM messages, that weren't already, that conflicted with Frostfall, into the Frostfall module.
Corrected additional errors as needed.
Now works with T3nd0s Perkus Maxamus.

Install
=======
Simply Install with your favorite mod manager
Or
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the .esp file from \Skyrim\Data\

History
=======
1.1, 2014/11/17 - Updated module from Raulfin
1.0, 2014/7/12 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
You can find me on NexusMods as 'Saint Jib'

Credits
=======
Thanks to Raulfin for the fixed version.
Thanks to VorpalBlades for the original mod.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to NexusMods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
TES5Edit - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11536
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
This mod is based on VorpalBlades' original Frostfall module for TTYM, all credit for the original file is given to him.
author: VorpalBlades Helseth and Raulfin
